empty.title: Add your personal documents
empty.text: Always keep them with you in a secure space to simplify your administrative procedures. They will never be used without your explicit consent.

importAuto.title: Auto import
importAuto.text: Connect your energy or telecom services to your Cozy to get your bills. Your supporting documents will be updated automatically

importPicture.title: Take a picture
importPicture.text: Use your camera or an existing document

recto.text: Take a picture of the front of your ID card

verso.text: Take a picture of the back of your ID card

number.text: What is your credit card number? (written on the front)

peremptionDate.text: When was your card issued? (written on the back)
